Start: ^I step out into the gardens. its rather cold out tonight.
^There isn't a single star in sky tonight.
StoneGiant: ^I don't really have a reason to be strolling out here at this time of night, but I feels nice being out here with the fireflies.
^Walking around the beaten path, I spot an unusual sight.
^It's Isaac, sitting in a little hidden patch of grass, staring up at the sky.
^He is almost motionless, like a stone giant silently protecting the guardians.
^He is, however, noticably perturbed. @I walk over to see how he's doing.
TryAgain: ^I go to where I know Isaac is hiding, to talk to him about what is bothering him.
Quiet: ^] "I don't usually see you out here."

c: ^] "Oh! um, want to be left alone then?"
^] "Do you.. want to talk about it?"

PullingTeeth: ^Whether I am or not, I’m still leaving

c: ^] "Whether I am or not, I’m still leaving."

PoorGrip: ^] "when...@ if you don't mind me asking,@ are you leaving, Isaac?"
^"I... try not to think about it..."
OpenAnswer: ^"...Does your life feel like its moving too fast for you?"
^"Do, uh, do you feel that way too?"
^After a few quiet seconds, Isaac nods, slightly.
^I don't really recall seeing Isaac until he and Eduardo we dating, some six months ago.

c: ^] "You've only been here about six months right?"
^probably not been here just 6 months. maybe he got here soon after I did?
^] "You've only been here about a year right?"
^I know how long he's been here, because he's told me.
^] "You've been here for almost 2 and a half years, haven't you?"
^Isaac nods. not even a little shocked I guessed it correctly.

b: ^Jeez! what's been keeping him here this long?
^I spent 5 years in a literal psych ward, and I'm getting out after only a year.

Talkative: ^"...Sorry I'm bad.... At speaking.... that is."
^"...People think I'm either... @...some Stoic or... @...a Wallflower."
^"and I don't... say... what I think about all..."
^Isaac looks pained trying to speak as much as he is.
^"Because I was... not social... not eating... not... here?"
^Man, Isaac really does have trouble expressing himself. I guess I never notice when his boyfriends always around him.
^And he came to Sunflower house to improve himself, but still isn't any better. How should I help him?

c: ^ You give Isaac advice to improve himself, using your own awareness of your life, as an example.
^You try to motivate Isaac to improve himself with your empassioned expression.
^With your hightened Grace, You know you need to just give Isaac time to collect himself.

Relationships: ^<color=color_descriptor>You sit in silence as time passes, letting Isaac recompose himself.</color>
^having given Isaac time, he beings trying to talk about his relationship with Eduardo.
^he's at a lost of what to do.

c: ^<color=color_descriptor>You try give Isaac some relationship advice, based on your limited experiences, and what you've seen in media.</color>

Faulty: ^Isaac describes his experiences, feeling broken. faulty.
^At the end, you are given a choice to say something, or no.
GivenUp: ^I head off, leaving Isaac to stew in his hideaway.
^Something seems to be eating him, but I suppose I've tried to lend an ear.
HelpfulListener: ^I help Isaac up off the ground.
Recoil: ^<color=color_descriptor>As you keep talking, you notice Isaac has once again gone unreposnsive.</color>
^] "hey, uh, is any of this helping."
^I keep talking to Isaac for a while longer, but I don't feel like anything I'm saying is helpful.
^after a while, Isaac asks to leave, and we part ways. the biting cold of the night nips at my face.
^I guess I screwed that up? I feel like I did, anyways.
^Maybe I should've let Isaac talk more...
Recap: ^I go to Isaac's little hideaway, and talk him through his issues like last time.
